meanings.definition: A paper or electronic document used for organizing information or performing calculations.
meanings.sent1: I filled out the worksheet to practice my math skills.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out a worksheet for us to complete in class.
meanings.sent3: The worksheet was so full of numbers, it looked like a puzzle!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a worksheet, neatly arranging thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The worksheet helped me keep track of all my expenses.

meanings.definition: A piece of paper with questions or exercises for students to complete.
meanings.sent1: The worksheet had questions about animals and their habitats.
meanings.sent2: Every student had to turn in their completed worksheet at the end of class.
meanings.sent3: The worksheet seemed to be testing my knowledge of the entire universe!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a worksheet, each question revealing a new facet of her personality.
meanings.sent5: The worksheet made learning about history fun and interactive.
